script.name: plugin.expguild.rewards
script.description: Exploers Guild: Get lst of rewards
script.sourceplaintext:
$DEFINE.DISCOVERY.POINTS = 25000 $DEFINE.SPECIAL.DISCOVERY = 750000 $DEFINE.COST = 10 $DEFINE.COST.CREDIT = 5
$rewards = table alloc
$hq = get player HQ $exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' if $exp.data $common.blueprint = $exp.data['common.ships'] $rare.blueprint = $exp.data['rare.ships'] $station.blueprint = $exp.data['stations'] else $common.blueprint = table alloc $rare.blueprint = table alloc $station.blueprint = table alloc end $equipment.blueprint = table alloc $equipment.blueprint[Boarding Pod] = Boarding Pod
* add money $rnd = random value from 0 to 10 - 1 $rnd = ( $rnd + 1 ) * 100000 $points = $rnd / $DEFINE.COST.CREDIT $rewards[$rnd] = $points
* get a blue print gosub sub.GetBlueprint
* extras $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd <= 2 gosub sub.GetAstro else if $rnd <= 30 gosub sub.GetDiscovery else if $rnd <= 50 gosub sub.GetAgent else if $rnd <= 65 gosub sub.GetWares else gosub sub.GetArms end
$reward.size = size of table $rewards while $reward.size < $a.num $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd <= 20 gosub sub.GetBlueprint else if $rnd <= 30 gosub sub.GetArms else if $rnd <= 40 gosub sub.GetDiscovery else gosub sub.GetWares end
$reward.size = size of table $rewards @ = wait 10 ms end
do if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 gosub sub.GetSpecialDiscovery do if random value from 0 to 20 - 1 gosub sub.GetWares
return $rewards
sub.GetAgent: if $hq -> exists $agents = get all agents: race=Player $size = 0 do if $agents $size = size of array $agents
if $size < 5 $rnd = random value from 5 to 9 - 1 $points = random value from 10 to 16 - 1 $points = $points * 12000 $aRaces = create new array, arguments=Argon, Boron, Split, Paranid, Teladi $race = get random array item: array=$aRaces $female = [FALSE] if $race == Argon skip if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $female = [TRUE] end $name = get random name: race=$race, female=$female $array = create new array, arguments=$rnd, $points, $name, $race, $female $rewards['agent'] = $array end end endsub
sub.GetWares: if $hq -> exists $array = array alloc: size=8 $array[0] = Energy Cells $array[1] = Silicon Wafers $array[2] = Metal Alloys $array[3] = Crystals $array[4] = Microchips $array[5] = Cloth Rimes $array[6] = Computer Components $array[7] = Quantum Tubes
$i = size of array $array while $i dec $i = $ware = $array[$i] if $hq -> exists do if $hq -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay continue end if $a.ship -> can transport ware $ware do if $a.ship -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay continue end remove element from array $array at index $i end
if size of array $array $ware = get random array item: array=$array $price = get average price of ware $ware $max = 1000000 / $price do if $max < 1 $max = 1 if $hq -> exists $ship.max = $a.ship -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay $hq.max = $hq -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay do if $hq.max > $ship.max $ship.max = $hq.max else $ship.max = $a.ship -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay end $max = get minimum, $ship.max, $max, null, null, null $rnd = random value from 0 to $max - 1 inc $rnd = $points = ( $price / $DEFINE.COST ) * $rnd $array = create new array, arguments=$rnd, $points, null, null, null $rewards[$ware] = $array end end endsub
sub.GetArms: $array = array alloc: size=33 $array[0] = Banshee Missile $array[1] = Boarding Pod $array[2] = Beluga Missile $array[3] = Disruptor Missile $array[4] = Firelance Missile $array[5] = Rapier Missile $array[6] = Thorn $array[7] = Sting $array[8] = Needle $array[9] = Tornado Missile $array[10] = Wildfire Missile $array[11] = Windstalker Missile $array[12] = Matter/Anti-Matter Launcher $array[13] = Electro-Magnetic Plasma Cannon $array[14] = Flak Artillery Array $array[15] = Fusion Beam Cannon $array[16] = Phased Array Laser Cannon $array[17] = Plasma Beam Cannon $array[18] = Tri-Beam Cannon $array[19] = Tractor Beam $array[20] = Incendiary Bomb Launcher $array[21] = 25 MJ Shield $array[22] = 200 MJ Shield $array[23] = 1 GJ Shield $array[24] = Relay Beacon $array[25] = 2 GJ Shield $array[26] = Photon Pulse Cannon $array[27] = Dark Matter Beam Cannon $array[28] = Gamma Pulse Emitter $array[29] = High Energy Particle Railgun $array[30] = Electro-Magnetic Repeater $array[31] = Quantum Shockwave Cannon $array[32] = Electro-Magnetic Emitter
$i = size of array $array while $i dec $i = $ware = $array[$i] if $hq -> exists do if $hq -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay continue end if $a.ship -> can transport ware $ware do if $a.ship -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay continue end remove element from array $array at index $i end
if size of array $array $ware = get random array item: array=$array $price = get average price of ware $ware $max = 200000 / $price do if $max < 1 $max = 1 if $hq -> exists $ship.max = $a.ship -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay $hq.max = $hq -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay do if $hq.max > $ship.max $ship.max = $hq.max else $ship.max = $a.ship -> get free volume of ware $ware in cargo bay end $max = get minimum, $ship.max, $max, null, null, null $rnd = random value from 0 to $max - 1 inc $rnd = $points = ( $price / $DEFINE.COST ) * $rnd $array = create new array, arguments=$rnd, $points, null, null, null $rewards[$ware] = $array end endsub
sub.GetBlueprint: if $hq -> exists $equipment.blueprint.size = size of table $equipment.blueprint $rare.blueprint.size = size of table $rare.blueprint $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1
$blueprint.select = null if $rnd <= 5 AND $equipment.blueprint.size > 0 $blueprint.select = $equipment.blueprint $blueprint.multi = 5 else if $rnd <= 20 AND $rare.blueprint.size > 0 $blueprint.select = $rare.blueprint $blueprint.multi = 2 else if $rnd <= 80 $blueprint.select = $common.blueprint $blueprint.multi = 1 else $blueprint.select = $station.blueprint $blueprint.multi = 2 end
if $blueprint.select while size of table $blueprint.select $blueprint = get random key: table=$blueprint.select if $hq ->player HQ has blueprints for: type=$blueprint remove key $blueprint from table $blueprint.select else $points = get average price of ware $blueprint $points = ( $points / $DEFINE.COST ) * $blueprint.multi $rewards[$blueprint] = $points break end end end end endsub
sub.GetSpecialDiscovery: $ret.done = [FALSE] if $exp.data if not get global variable: name='no.terrans' if not $exp.data['special.bought'] * check for special discovery $plot.flags = get plot flags $total.points = get total player discovery points if $total.points >= $DEFINE.SPECIAL.DISCOVERY *if ! ( $plot.flags & 1024 ) * has the player unlocked a TOA yet if $exp.data['player.built.toa'] $b.t = get sector from universe index: x=4, y=6 if $b.t -> exists $flags = [Find.ExcludeGates] | [Find.ExcludeTerranGates] | [Find.Hyperspeed] $hsap = find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=$b.t, max dist=null, refpos=null if $hsap -> exists $current.time = playing time $timeout = $exp.data['special.discovery.timeout'] if ! $timeout OR $current.time > $timeout $timeout = $current.time + 3700 $exp.data['special.discovery.timeout'] = $timeout $rewards['special'] = 250000 $ret.done = [TRUE] end end end end end end end end endsub
sub.GetDiscovery: if $exp.data gosub sub.GetSpecialDiscovery do if $ret.done endsub if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $array.discoveries = create new array, arguments='created.discoveries', null, null, null, null else if random value from 0 to 2 - 1 $array.discoveries = create new array, arguments='created.discoveries', 'created.special.discoveries', null, null, null else $array.discoveries = create new array, arguments='created.discoveries', 'created.xenon.discoveries', null, null, null end end $discovery.i = size of array $array.discoveries while $discovery.i dec $discovery.i = $discoveries = $array.discoveries[$discovery.i] $discoveries = $exp.data[$discoveries] if $discoveries while size of table $discoveries $discovery = get random key: table=$discoveries if not $discovery -> exists remove key $discovery from table $discoveries continue else if $discovery -> is of class Ship $ship.owner = $discovery -> get owner race if $ship.owner != Neutral Race remove key $discovery from table $discoveries continue end end
$points = $discovery ->get discovery points if not $points remove key $discovery from table $discoveries continue end $points = $DEFINE.DISCOVERY.POINTS $rewards[$discovery] = $points $discovery.i = 0 break end end end end endsub
sub.GetAstro: $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd <= 15 $mineral = Ice else if $rnd <= 50 $mineral = Silicon Ore else $mineral = Ore end $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd <= 15 $yield = 96 else if $rnd <= 50 $yield = 64 else $yield = 48 end $points = ( 200000 * $yield ) / 48 $astro = create new array, arguments=$yield, $points, $mineral, null, null $rewards['astro'] = $astro endsub return null

line.text: player HQ has blueprints for: type=

comment.var: has the player unlocked a TOA yet

line.text: get sector from universe index: x=

sval.val: Exploers Guild: Get lst of rewards
has the player unlocked a TOA yet
